872: After having loved both of sorry given my nights of love, here I am again waiting, you need your rain and sun. Having swum in tears, my bitter tears came to the sea, just in the sand listening siren song that gives me grief. I love you and I just hope to be your partner when dawn, bread trough seeking your silver breeze kissing your skin comes. I am a prisoner of the two beams of light that illuminate your face ...
